document.full_text: while the women's game is becoming more and more power-based in recent years, simply bludgeoning the ball across the net will not be enough to win the french open, champion francesca schiavone said on friday.
document.title: power alone is not enough on clay, says schiavone
lines_and_colors: while the women's game is becoming more and more power-based in recent years, simply bludgeoning the ball across the net will not be enough to win the french open, champion francesca schiavone said on friday.
